page.title: 02SOCIAL CLUBS & SPORT
page.content:
About one third of the group attended a club once or twice a week. These were children's clubs, e.g. Boys and and Girls Brigade, Cubs ,Brownies. Very few attend clubs as a family and only 3 families took their children to a social club.
SPORT
More than half played sport e.g. football, golf, snooker, cricket, judo, karate, running, pool, rowing, swimming, bowls, squash. Of these by far the most important sport is football. Very many more people take part in sport than spend leisure time watching. More people travel to watch football than any other sport. The only sport which people travel to see
